name: model_draft.emsig_energy_data_by_ems
title: Metadata for the table emsig_energy_data_by_ems
description: Energy data recorded by decentralized household energy management systems (EMS).

sources.title: OpenEMS Association e.V.
sources.description: Recordings of a productive Energy Management System based on OpenEMS Edge

licenses.name: ODbL-1.0
licenses.title: Open Data Commons Open Database License 1.0
licenses.instruction: You are free to share and change, but you must attribute, and share derivations under the same license.

contributors.title: Stefan Feilmeier
contributors.comment: Add copyright to source and license

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier.

fields.name: ems_id
fields.description: Identifier of the EMS.

fields.name: time
fields.description: Point of time when the data was collected

fields.name: _sum_production_ac_active_powerl1
fields.description: Active power generated by the photovoltaic system on phase one

fields.name: _sum_production_ac_active_powerl2
fields.description: Active power generated by the photovoltaic system on phase two

fields.name: _sum_production_ac_active_powerl3
fields.description: Active power generated by the photovoltaic system on phase three

fields.name: _sum_production_ac_active_power
fields.description: Active power generated by the photovoltaic system from all three phases

fields.name: _sum_grid_active_power
fields.description: Fed in and drawn active power of the grid meter from all three phases

fields.name: _sum_grid_active_powerl1
fields.description: Fed in and drawn active power of the grid meter on the phase one

fields.name: _sum_grid_active_powerl2
fields.description: Fed in and drawn active power of the grid meter on the phase two

fields.name: _sum_grid_active_powerl3
fields.description: Fed in and drawn active power of the grid meter on the phase three

fields.name: _sum_ess_active_powerl1
fields.description: Charged and discharged active power of the energy storage system on the phase one

fields.name: _sum_ess_active_powerl2
fields.description: Charged and discharged active power of the energy storage system on the phase two

fields.name: _sum_ess_active_powerl3
fields.description: Charged and discharged active power of the energy storage system on the phase three

fields.name: _sum_ess_active_power
fields.description: Charged and discharged active power of the energy storage system from all three phases

fields.name: _sum_ess_soc
fields.description: State of charge of the energy storage system

fields.name: _sum_consumption_active_power
fields.description: Consumed active power from all loads on all three phases

fields.name: _sum_consumption_active_powerl1
fields.description: Consumed active power from all loads on phase one

fields.name: _sum_consumption_active_powerl2
fields.description: Consumed active power from all loads on phase two

fields.name: _sum_consumption_active_powerl3
fields.description: Consumed active power from all loads on phase three

_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO 8601 standard including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
_comment.licenses: License name must be an identifier from SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
_comment.null: If any value is not applicable use 'null' without any quotation marks. However, if there are no foreignKeys, drop the entire structure contained and only leave "foreignKeys": []
